title: Standards-Based Adaptive Science Learning Course Design

context.additional_context: Personalized Support Through Digital Device Utilization and Learning Analytics

learning_goals: Learners can apply science concepts with over 80% accuracy in an adaptive learning environment based on IMS Learning Design standards.
Learners can generate personalized recommended learning paths in three or more stages through learning data analysis.
Learners demonstrate foundational scientific problem-solving skills by achieving 75 points or higher in summative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
